title: Process Scrapped Inventory
description: An item returned by a customer is deemed unsalable and must be scrapped.

tasks.description: Scan the item's RMA tag to retrieve its inspection status.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the item's disposition is 'Scrap'.

tasks.description: Move the item to the designated scrap area in the warehouse.
Process an inventory adjustment to remove the item from stock, using 'Scrap' as the reason code.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adjusts the inventory out of the system, and the quantity on hand is reduced.
